resources.string: Jian Ghomeshi is a Canadian broadcaster, writer and musician born in London, England, and raised in Thornhill, Ontario. From 1990 to 2000 he was a member of the Thornhill-based folk-pop band Moxy Früvous, as a vocalist and drummer. Jian Ghomeshi is a Canadian broadcaster, writer and musician born in London, England, and raised in Thornhill, Ontario. From 1990 to 2000 he was a member of the Thornhill-based folk-pop band Moxy Früvous, as a vocalist and drummer. Jian Ghomeshi is a Canadian broadcaster, writer and musician born in London, England, and raised in Thornhill, Ontario. From 1990 to 2000 he was a member of the Thornhill-based folk-pop band Moxy Früvous, as a vocalist and drummer.(Wikipedia)
